result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel Robert Rohde was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Daniel Robert Rohde is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Daniel Robert Rohde was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

cc: DA, Def, Atty Yacoub, Jail and SCSO.
Order for payment at 01-11-2016 01:30 pm

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA: Edward Minser DF ATTY:  Sarah Slice Yacoub   DF:  Daniel Robert Rohde appeared from jail. Case called at 8:36 a.m. Atty Yacoub recites agreement. ADA Minser in agreement. Requests to amend the information on the record for Count 1 as a Misdemeanor.Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads NO CONTEST   to amended Ct 1 Possession of THC, Misdemeanor in 15CF369 . DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of amended Ct 1 Possession of THC, Misdemeanor  in 15CF369. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 2 in 15CF369. Sentencing arguments. Atty Yacoub requesting expungement. ADA Minser gives objection. DE makes statement. Court is going to DENY the request for expungement.  Crt orders:

-  Impose 87 days credit. TIME SERVED

- DNA Sample and Surcharge

- Misdemeanor Court Costs. 60 days to pay
Plea hearing at 11-02-2015 08:30 am

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Edward Minser   DF ATTY:  Sarah Slice Yacoub   DF:  Daniel Robert Rohde appeared from jail. Case called at 11:05 a.m. ADA Minser requesting a plea hearing be set in a month. Atty Yacoub in agreement. Possible diversion plan.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Signed by RMW on 9/14/2015. c: DA and Atty. km
Pre-trial conference at 09-28-2015 11:00 am

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:   Edward Minser   DF ATTY:  Sarah Slice Yacoub   DF:  Daniel Robert Rohde appeared from jail. Case called at 11:12 a.m. Court reviews file. Court received a motion to return seized property. ADA Minser states the property will be returned. Atty Yacoub will prepare an order for the courts signature.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 28, 2015 at 11:00 am.
for Return of Seized Property. Filed by Atty Yacoub. km
Pre-trial conference at 09-14-2015 11:00 am

Bond is to be Co-Signed by  Bond is to be Co-Signed by Chris Kobs    
    

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

-   Report every  Wednesday before 5:00pm  to St Croix County Jail for UA testing, in the presence of an officer or deputy of the same sex.  If UA tests positive defendant shall submit to additional evidentiary testing to determine the use of substances forbidden by this bond agreement at the jail or Hudson Hospital.  Defendant must pay $5.00 fee at time of each test.

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:   Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  Sarah Slice Yacoub   DF:  Daniel Robert Rohde appeared from jail. Case called at 10:05 a.m. Atty Caton requesting to be withdrawn as counsel due to conflict of interest. Court approves the Motion of Withdrawl of Counsel filed by Atty Caton. Atty Yacoub has been retained. Has discovery and copy of information. Court informs Def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Atty Yacoub waives further reading of the information, enters a plea of NG. Requesting bond modification. ADA McKinley objects. Atty Yacoub gives argument relating to bond. Defendant does not know if he can post the $500. Parents are present in the court and can not post the bond money. If released, defendant would reside with parents. State requesting this motion to be put in writing and time to review. Court notes bond always able to be reviewed at bind over but motion should be filed in writing. Mr. Kobs would be willing to co-sign a bond. Is employed full-time, rents a home. Atty Yacoub waives speedy trial  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 11:00 am.
to Withdraw from Representation. Filed by Atty Caton. km

Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives preliminary hearing. Crt finds probable cause and binds DE over for trial. No modifications of bond requested. Bond continues.  Arraignment scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 10:00 am.
